title: What is the meaning of song 'Up and Up' by Coldplay? - Quora

Meaning a person who's lost something important and looking to get back on the right track again with the other being hopeful and helpful in making them achieve so. Searching for the water and hoping for the rain being the person going through suffering, being poor ( meal to meal) the hopeful person tries to encourage to rise and soar above the storm. Instead of lying in the gutter you've got to experience it all, and every seed can be fruitful if nurtured. Towards the end Chris tries to say that everyone has a different perspective for everything and one can either accept it or get what they want. It is about rebuilding and growth. In a relationship, there are bad phases when you fight a lot and argue on just about everything. Right when it feels like it’s broken, the song sparks this idea of “fixing up a car and driving it again” and not losing hope in the bond and it then moves on to this whole concept of fate saying “we’re gonna get it, get it together somehow”. It’s this belief that is reflected throughout the song, and is something that Chris Martin must’ve been holding on to throughout his divorce with Gwyneth Paltrow…
